TITLE: BLVR with endobronchial valves in RUL (initial) and RML (additional)

INDICATION
Severe heterogeneous emphysema; candidate for bronchoscopic lung volume reduction.

ANESTHESIA
General anesthesia by anesthesia team.

PRE-ASSESSMENT
Chartis collateral ventilation assessment:
• RUL: CV- (negative)
• RML: CV- (negative)
CT fissure integrity adequate.

VALVE PLACEMENT
• Initial lobe: RUL – 2 Zephyr valves placed (sizes 4.0 and 5.5).
• Additional lobe: RML – 2 Zephyr valves placed (sizes 4.0 and 4.0).

Post-deployment checks confirm appropriate seating. No valve removals performed in this session.

COMPLICATIONS
None intra-procedure.

POST-PROCEDURE
Portable CXR ordered per protocol; patient to monitored unit.
